items.sentence: I think you should do what Tom tells you to do.
Did you tell Tom when we expect him to be here?
Did Tom tell you what to do with all his stuff?
Did Tom tell you what this building used to be?
Could you please tell Tom to come to my office?
Did Tom tell you everything you wanted to know?
Tom was just sitting there, staring into space.
Tom sat on the pier with his feet in the water.
If Tom shows up, it's going to ruin Mary's day.
We're still trying to find out where Tom lives.
Tom pulled a big wad of cash out of his pocket.
Tom works for a big advertising firm in Boston.
If Tom drops by, please give him this document.
I'll never forget how kind Tom was to everyone.
Tom has a distinctive scar under his right eye.
Tom was lying in the hospital bed, unconscious.
Tom looked through the contents of the package.
Tom shaved his head with a straight-edge razor.
Tom grabbed his jacket and headed out the door.
Tom reached into his knapsack for a flashlight.
